snippet: Oil prices held last week’s gains on speculation that OPEC might agree to cut production to reduce a supply glut.
abstract: Oil prices remain unchanged following assumption that Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Counties is thinking about cutting production; overabundance of oil has been driving commodity's price down to its lowest in over decade.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices held last week’s gains on speculation that OPEC might agree to cut production to reduce a supply glut.

headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Hold Steady as OPEC Weighs Next Move
headline.main: Oil Prices Are Steady as OPEC Weighs Next Move
